Reason: The configuration option _monitor is performance-sensitive. The decision to create either a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal object based on the value of _transientMode directly impacts the system performance. Depending on the value of _transientMode, different types of journal objects are created, which can have significant performance variations in terms of execution time and memory consumption. This configuration involves performance-related operations within its related code, leading to notable performance variations at the system level.
